info.title: ALPHA VANTAGE FOREX API
info.description: This API returns intraday time series (timestamp, open, high, low, close) of the FX currency pair specified, updated realtime.

tags: Forex Daily Prices (open, high, low, close)
get.summary: Call for Checking Forex FX Intraday (5min) Time Series And FX Daily data.

parameters.name: function
parameters.description: Select API function to get either Intra-Day and Daily results

parameters.name: from_symbol
parameters.description: Fill in ISO currency code symbol

parameters.name: to_symbol
parameters.description: Fill in ISO currency code symbol

parameters.name: interval
parameters.description: The value to apply to the FX_INTRADAY filter. Should be populates with a value of 5min only

parameters.name: apikey
parameters.description: Enter a valid API key received from Alpha Vantage Support
